data.title: Doctor Who Spinoff K9 Comes Into Focus at MIP
data.meta_description: Doctor Who’s metal mutt is running with a younger crowd for his return to television. As revealed in promotional materials found at this years MIP international television content convention (above), K9 features the cherried-out robotic canine supercomputer fighting to save the Earth alongside some plucky teens. data.text:
Doctor Who's metal mutt is running with a younger crowd for his return to television.

As revealed in promotional materials found at this years MIP international television content convention (above), K9 features the cherried-out robotic canine supercomputer fighting to save the Earth alongside some plucky teens.

Meanwhile, Park Entertainment (the company behind the new international production) is slowly revealing episode titles on a preview site for the show, MetalMuttsite.com.

Finally, Bob Baker (co-creator of K9 for the Tom Baker era of Doctor Who -- alongside then-writing partner Dave Martin) opened up forum discussions to kick the tin dog around on his website.

Images courtesy Park Entertainment

See also:
